tool.name: mitoRiboUmi
tool.command: ln -s $input /scratch/matrix.${format} && ln -s $input_gtf /scratch/file.gtf && ####Rscript /home/main.R Buettner csv , Mus_musculus.GRCm38.95.gtf protein_coding 3 Rscript $__tool_directory__/main.R matrix $format $Separator file.gtf $biotype $umiXgene && mv /scratch/Ribo_mito.pdf $output

param.name: umiXgene
param.help: a integer defining how many UMI are required to call a gene as present

tool.help: mitoriboumi plots the cells according to the number of significative genes, mitochondrial and ribosomal genes percentage.
